titlealts.searchtitle: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1: Related OpenStack Documentation

body.section:
Fixed in this release
CVE-2016-2074 - Remote Code Execution (RCE) or Denial of Service (DoS) attacks in OVS.A patched version of OVS version 2.3 has been included in HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1.4 to address this vulnerability.

section.b: VM specification is different with the latest OVA
section.p:
In this release, the following differences are seen by default for Nova compute proxy and OVSvApp :
CD-ROM device is attached
NIC port is added
RAM is 1 GB
CPU is 1
To download HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1.4, log into HDN and find the location of Helion OpenStack 1.1.4. The file you download will be called HelionOpenStack-1.1.4.tgz.
Follow the existing installation instructions here: Installation Overview for HPE Helion OpenStack 1.x.
